title: Online Distance Education Quality Assessment Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital device utilization
context.additional_context: Learners use smartphones as the primary tool, practicing interaction and feedback evaluation via VR simulations; assessment tools are provided through mobile-optimized interfaces

learning_goals: Learners can explain an online education quality evaluation system based on a learning design framework
Learners can interpret interaction/feedback activity data using learning analytics tools
Learners can measure at least three quality indicators (engagement, interaction frequency, feedback timeliness) using the eDAT tool

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
